metadata.subject: Michael Cohen says he's postponing testimony over threats by Trump

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022

relationships.description: Kahn is sending Epstein a news article about Michael Cohen
Cohen alleges threats from Trump regarding congressional testimony

analysis.purpose: To share breaking news about Michael Cohen's postponed congressional testimony and alleged threats from Trump
analysis.significance: Documents communication about significant political developments involving Trump and his former attorney during congressional investigations

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion in this communication - simply sharing a news article

illegal_activity.description: Document contains a forwarded news article about alleged threats from Trump to Michael Cohen - no first-hand illegal activity by sender or recipients

details: NY Post article about Michael Cohen's postponed testimony
Includes full article URL and tracking parameters

public_knowledge.context: Michael Cohen's testimony and relationship with Trump was widely covered in media during 2019 congressional investigations

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn forwards a NY Post article to Jeffrey Epstein about Michael Cohen postponing his congressional testimony due to alleged threats from Trump, marking the email as high importance.
